alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 10 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Montgomery and southeastern Chautauqua Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chautauqua, or 8 miles south of Sedan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caney, Sedan, Tyro, Peru, Chautauqua, Havana and Niotaze. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
